text: My name ain't Bit, but I keep that Coin, boy
Product design is truly an art guided by science, NOT the other way around.
Knowing your audience sells the story. Knowing your user shapes the experience. Marketing speaks; UX listens. Don't confuse the two.
Respect your first impression, but never trust it fully. Perception is a process, not a passing glance.
Unless you're all-knowing, you're ignorant of something. Humility isn't weakness, it's awareness.
Creating software is like building a house. Its layers built on top of layers, but without a good foundation... you'll need a new home again REAL soon.
In software, there's no shortage of chefs, don't hire one for the title, hire one for the taste.
It's called a 'road-map' because you can always draw a path, but you'll need a map to get back to it.
